name: VermontNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
VTDigger is Vermont's member-supported online news daily. Every day, we publish watchdog reports on state government, politics, consumer affairs, business and public policy.

Our Alexa flash briefing includes four of our top stories every day. Tune in on weekday afternoons to get the latest Vermont news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
